channel.title: James' Sports Report
channel.description: Recent content on James' Sports Report

item.title: How I lost March Madness
item.description: Well that didn’t go as planned. I said these exact words. “I feel that I know a lot about college basketball.” I had an opportunity with the big-10 tournament winning that and thought I could do the same thing. Little did I know that I would finish in 11th place out of 17 people. With my professor beating me in the final days. So How did I do?

item.title: How I picked March Madness 2021
item.description: I feel that I know a lot about College Basketball, but when it comes down to March Madness, I seem to figure out that I have won by the slimmest of margins. Simply put, I am lucky with winning this. I usually look to into detail at teams that are getting hot at the right time. Also I have picked based on coaches in March. With this model, I see that I have chosen very wrong, but let’s see what where It will go.

item.title: About James Rowland
item.description: An avid sports watcher and viewer working on code for the first time
